User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.1
Build ID: 20110830092941

Steps to reproduce:

In some Social sites, receiving a Message opens a popup window with the message.
I press "delete" button on popup window.

Sample site: http://www.adam4adam.com/
Need to be member - easy to sign up.


Actual results:

Message is deleted, and the popup window remains open.

Also, Close buttons on the profile popup, does not react.

[Do I miss the proper Java? I think that I am up to date]


Expected results:

The popup window should close automatically!

Prior to FF5 that was the case. Also, when using latest Explorer, Opera or Chrome, all is as expected -the popup window does close automatically and all buttons are active.
